description: Chrome automation: Select GWU profile and navigate to Blackboard

actions.description: Open Blackboard in Chrome browser
Wait for Chrome to load and show profile selection
Click the GWU profile button to select the correct Chrome profile
Wait for profile to load and Chrome to navigate
Click on the address bar to focus it for navigation
Wait for address bar to be focused
Type the Blackboard courses URL directly in the address bar
Wait for URL to be entered
Press Enter to navigate to Blackboard
Wait for Blackboard to load and redirect to Microsoft login

actions.name: username
actions.description: Set username variable (will be filled by user input)

actions.prompt: Enter your GWU username and press Enter:
actions.description: Wait for user to enter username
Type the username in the Microsoft login form
Wait for username to be entered
Press Enter to proceed to password field
Wait for password field to appear

actions.name: password
actions.description: Set password variable (will be filled by user input)

actions.prompt: Enter your GWU password and press Enter:
actions.description: Wait for user to enter password
Type the password in the Microsoft login form
Wait for password to be entered
Press Enter to sign in
Wait for authentication and redirect to Blackboard
Click address bar to verify we're on Blackboard
Wait to confirm successful navigation

actions.name: success_message
actions.value: Successfully logged into Blackboard! You can now access your courses.
actions.description: Set success message
Show the success message and keep Blackboard open
